name: Travel Planner
description: Plan your next travel better with NotionOrganize and keep track of your destinations, itinerary, and expenses for a better travel experience.What's Inside?Basic Travel PlannerThe basic planner is designed for those focusing on a singular journey.Plan an itinerary for a single tripUltimate Travel Dashboard:All-in-one Travel Companion: Designed for the frequent explorer, our ultimate dashboard lets you plan and manage unlimited trips all in one place. But we didn't stop there. Plan unlimited trips
features: Plan an itinerary for a single trip; Plan unlimited trips and itineraries; Track your travel expenses for every trip; Log your travel reflection in your journal; Collect travel essentials and items; Navigation sidebar and action buttons
